entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Akulivik

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 7.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
